title: Don't Drop The Mic with Bishop T.D. Jakes and Pastor Steven Furtick
description: God has given us each a microphone and we have an obligation to share what we’ve learned. In "Don't Drop The Mic," Bishop T.D. Jakes of The Potter's House and Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church talk about the power of our words and living life in every season.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: God has given us each a microphone and we have an obligation to share what we’ve learned. In "Don't Drop The Mic," Bishop T.D. Jakes of The Potter's House and Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church talk about the power of our words and living life in every season.
